numlitem.para: No thrust reverser damage exists which would adversely affect aircraft operation,
Thrust reverser for associated engine is deactivated and locked in stowed (forward thrust) position, and

note.para: No performance adjustments required on UPS aircraft.

numlitem.para: Asymmetrical reverse thrust may be used. Use normal reversing procedures and techniques. If it appears that rudder authority is becoming limited during deceleration, return lever to reverse idle detent.
Land and Hold Short Operations (LAHSO) prohibited.
Downgrade aircraft dispatch category status to CAT 3a.
Land and Hold Short Operations (LAHSO) prohibited.

note.para: Must be operative for dispatch into LPB, UIO, BOG, GUA,TGU.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "REV UNLOCK INDICATION INOP" for affected reverser and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
Placard affected Reverser Thrust Lever "REVERSER INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.

numlitem.para: Check thrust reverser is physically normal (No visible damage and thrust reverser sleeve is in alignment by visual inspection).
Deactivate thrust reverser in accordance with Dispatch Maintenance Procedure 78-31-1-1.
